words.definition: feeling enthusiastic or determined to achieve something
examples: I feel motivated after watching that inspirational movie.
He stayed motivated during tough times.
A motivated person can achieve anything they dream of.

words.definition: having made a firm decision and being resolved not to change it
examples: She was determined to win the competition.
Despite failures, he remained determined to succeed.
A determined mind can overcome any obstacle.

words.definition: an act of defeating an enemy or opponent
examples: The team celebrated their victory with great joy.
Victory often comes after many failures.
His first victory was a turning point in his career.

words.definition: something that is left behind by someone after they are gone
examples: Maharana Pratap left behind a powerful legacy.
The legacy of great leaders inspires generations.
She wants to leave a positive legacy through her work.
His bravery in the battle was admirable.
Helping others is an admirable quality.
She did an admirable job leading the project.

words.definition: the ability to do something that frightens one
examples: It takes courage to speak the truth.
He showed great courage in facing the challenges.
Courage is the first step toward success.

words.definition: an act of traveling from one place to another; a process of learning or growing
examples: Life is a beautiful journey full of surprises.
Their journey across the desert was difficult but memorable.
Success is not a destination, itâ€™s a journey.

words.definition: the reason or reasons one has for acting or behaving in a particular way
examples: Watching 3 Idiots gives me a lot of motivation.
Motivation helps people keep moving even in hard times.
He found motivation in his dream to become a doctor.

words.definition: a particular way of thinking about something
examples: Watching realistic movies gives me a new perspective on life.
Traveling can broaden your perspective.
It's important to see things from another person's perspective.
The movie had a huge impact on me.
Her speech made a great impact on the audience.
Good books can leave a lasting impact on your thinking.
